CustomField.formula: IF( OR( ISBLANK(Days_to_Close_Lecture__c), Days_to_Close_Lecture__c <= 0 ), "", IF( Days_to_Close_Lecture__c > 14, "Outside SLA", IF( OR( ISPICKVAL(Status, "New"), ISPICKVAL(Status, "Working") ), "Pending Within SLA", IF( AND( Days_to_Close_Lecture__c <= 14, OR( ISPICKVAL(Status, "Converted"), ISPICKVAL(Status, "Closed - Not Converted"), ISPICKVAL(Status, "Unqualified") ) ), "Within SLA", "Outside SLA" ) ) ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Calculates SLA based on Days to Close (Lecture). Close within 14 days of Lecture, to stay within SLA.
CustomField.label: Lead Closure SLA
